subject: @SuiteClasses(...) expects only TestCases?!?
msgSnippet: Hi, building and running a suite with @SuiteClasses expects passing TestCases (SampleTest.class, AnotherTest.class). Why can t I pass other suites too?
messageBody:
Hi,

building and running a suite with @SuiteClasses expects passing
TestCases (SampleTest.class, AnotherTest.class). Why can't I pass
other suites too?


@RunWith(Suite.class)
@SuiteClasses( { SampleTest.class, AnotherTest.class})
public class AllTests {
public static void main(String[] args) {
JUnitCore.main(AllTests.class.getName());
}
}

Thanks.

Cheers
Michael
